title: Steel challenge
creator_credit: Wallace Productions, Pat Morton, A. Frank Bundy and Robin Cantelon
brief_description: Demonstrates the widespread use of the latest scientific techniques in steelmaking. As an example of this progress the changeover from open hearth to electric steelmaking is examined. Deals with the computer control of electric power, methods of quality control and improvements to steelmaking practice.
creator_credit_for_label: Wallace Productions, Pat Morton, A. Frank Bundy and Robin Cantelon
